short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interacting with, querying, and asserting web pages using AI through natural language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Midscene.js transforms UI automation into a joyful experience. By introducing AI capabilities, Midscene enables users to seamlessly interact, query, and assert with web pages using natural language.
